ENTRY.refkeywords: dataspace simulate sim blank empty grid gridded

DESC.PARA:
The dataspace2d command creates a blank 2D image with a grid in logical coordinates according to the dimensional array argument (dims). To create 1D data, use the dataspace1d command
("ahelp dataspace1d") .

LIST.ITEM: dims - array of image dimensions, i.e. [width,height]
id - the id of the new dataset; if not given, uses the default dataset id (id=1 by default, see "ahelp get_default_id")
dstype - dataset type: DataIMG (the default), Data2D, or Data2DInt

DESC.PARA: Create a blank image with dimensions 216x216.
Create a blank image that is 50x100 and give it an id of "newimg".
